element-citation.article-title: Synthesis of Nb 2O 5 nanoparticles through the oxidant peroxide method applied to organic pollutant photodegradation: a mechanistic study

ref.mixed-citation: Lopes, O.F., Paris, E.C., Ribeiro, C.., 2014. Synthesis of Nb2O5 nanoparticles through the oxidant peroxide method applied to organic pollutant photodegradation: a mechanistic study. Appl. Catal. B Environ. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.apcatb.2013.08.031
